title: How to unsubscribe from Naurok
description: Naurok is a free, multifunctional online testing platform developed for teachers in Ukraine. It provides interactive tests to check and improve knowledge and engage students in active learning. Since it is a free platform, there is no subscription to cancel. However, if you have an account and wish to close it, follow these general steps:

web.title: Delete Naurok Account via Website
web.description:
To delete your Naurok account via the website, follow these steps:

*   Go to the Naurok website (Naurok.ua).
*   Log in to your account.
*   Navigate to your account settings or profile page.
*   Look for an option to close or delete your account.
*   Follow the instructions provided to confirm the account closure.
*   Check your email for a confirmation message regarding the account deletion.

seo_text: Learn how to close your Naurok account. Since Naurok is a free platform, there is no subscription to cancel. Follow these steps to close your account.
